message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I know will be extremely valuable to your business.  My asking price is $1200000. This reflects the significant value I know it holds for you while still giving us both a strong deal. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 doesn't quite cover the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to come down to $1000000, reflecting a substantial discount from my initial offer. Let's work together to find a solution that's beneficial for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1000000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.
